README: This file contains the array 'scripts'. To add a new script, append an object with { id:number, name:string, image:string or empty, link:string, code:string }. If you paste an array into the in-app JSON editor it will replace the list. If you paste a single object it will be appended with a unique id.

scripts.name: Utils: Round Number
scripts.code:
// Round helper
function r(n, p=2){ return Number(n.toFixed(p)); }

scripts.name: UUID v4
scripts.code:
// UUID v4 (small)
function uuidv4(){return 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'.replace(/[xy]/g,c=>{let r=Math.random()*16|0;let v=c=='x'?r:(r&0x3|0x8);return v.toString(16);});}
